31.eng-name: The Book of Manumission of Slaves

hadiths.text: Abd Allah b. 'Umar reported the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying:If anyone emancipates a slave who has property, the property of the slave belongs to him except that the master makes a stipulation

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ أَعْتَقَ عَبْدًا وَلَهُ مَالٌ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding One Who Manumits A Slave Who Has Property
